sentences.sContent: The wardrobe was too heavy for me to move on my own.
sentences.sCn: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.sContent: The males are seven times heavier than the females.
sentences.sCn: 雄性的重量是雌性的七倍。

sentences.sContent: Heavy rain has caused flooding in many areas.
sentences.sCn: 大雨在很多地区造成水灾。

sentences.sContent: The apple trees were heavy with fruit.

...The company spent the last five years developing solar panels that are only about a quarter of inch thick and are strong enough to stand up to heavy highway traffic without breaking or making the roads more slippery...
...What should American college students do to cope with their heavy reading assignments...
...Colored people who lived in Piedmont did heavy manual jobs at the paper mill...
...with a heavy emphasis on real-world functionality...
...But she does have to drive through very heavy traffic to get here...
...The most obvious problem is that it might give museums a very heavy economic burden which directly impedes the sustainable development of these organizations...

synos.tran: 沉重的；繁重的，巨大的；阴沉的

phrases.pCn: 重油（将焦油蒸馏得到的比重大于水）

words.tran: 沉重；沉闷；笨拙；迟钝；忧伤
